content: this pattern isn t *mine* - it s a detailed modification of an existing vintage doily pattern that i ve updated for making into a lace throw/blanket please see the link below for the original doily pattern plus my chart and modifications **note** the original doily pattern was hosted on celt s vintage crochet website which closed december 2008 **update** the rainey sisters have put together a free downloadable pdf of both the pattern as written and my chart download here 1 *please note that while the above-mentioned pdf includes written instructions for a portion of the blanket as well as a chart there are no written directions for the chart * queue away 1 https //theraineysisters com/wp-content/uploads/2008/08/hemlock%20ring%20pattern%20aug%202008 pdf
